DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study follow : - To determine safety tolerability single ascend intravenous ( IV ) dose PF-05230907 healthy Japanese subject . - To characterize PK profile single ascend IV dos PF-05230907 healthy Japanese subject . - To characterize PD profile single ascend IV dos PF-05230907 healthy Japanese subject . - To evaluate immunogenicity PF-05230907 healthy Japanese subject
DOC.brief_title: Single Dose Study PF-05230907 Healthy Japanese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) < 120 kg ( 265 lb ) . Japanese subject four biologic Japanese grandparent born Japan . Pregnant nursing female . Females childbearing potential unwilling unable use acceptable method contraception . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease
